question: Mulching (an agronomic measure of soil conservation) is very effective because of which among the following reasons?
option1: It protects soil from gully erosion
option2: It helps soil to retain moisture and nutrients
option3: It protects soil from sheetwash and wind erosion
explanation: Mulches are materials which is placed over the soil surface to maintain moisture and improve soil conditions. Mulching protects soil from gully erosion by reducing both wind and water erosion during the winter season.
